mapper.select: SELECT MLR.COMPANY_CD , MLR.DIVISION_CD , MLR.PICKING_RESULT_ID , MLR.SEQ , MLR.PICKING_DETAIL_ID , MLR.STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MLR.COMPANY_CD, MLR.DIVISION_CD, 'WM0010', MLR.STATE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS STATE_NM , MLR.PICKING_MOVE_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MLR.COMPANY_CD, MLR.DIVISION_CD, 'WM0011', MLR.PICKING_MOVE_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS PICKING_MOVE_TYPE_NM , MLR.TO_LOGISTICS_UNIT_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOGISTICS_UNIT_NAME( MLR.COMPANY_CD, MLR.DIVISION_CD, MLR.TO_LOGISTICS_UNIT_CD) FROM DUAL) AS TO_LOGISTICS_UNIT_NM , MLR.FROM_AREA_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_AREA_NAME(MLR.COMPANY_CD, MLR.DIVISION_CD, MLR.FROM_AREA_CD) FROM DUAL) AS FROM_AREA_NM , MLR.FROM_LOGISTICS_UNIT_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOGISTICS_UNIT_NAME( MLR.COMPANY_CD, MLR.DIVISION_CD, MLR.FROM_LOGISTICS_UNIT_CD) FROM DUAL) AS FROM_LOGISTICS_UNIT_NM , MLR.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MlR.UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MlR.COMPANY_CD, MlR.DIVISION_CD, MlR.UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS UNIT_NM , MLR.QTY , MPD.DESCRIPTION , MlR.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATE_USER_NO , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MlR.COMPANY_CD, MlR.DIVISION_CD, MlR.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MlR.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE , ROWIDTOCHAR(MlR.ROWID) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_LOCATION_PICKING_RESULT MlR , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MlR.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MlR.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MlR.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MlR.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MlR.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MlR.PICKING_DETAIL_ID = #{pickingDetailId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MLR.PICKING_RESULT_ID , MLR.SEQ
